characters.name: MART
characters.description: Väike inimene, umbes 5-aastane poiss, lühikeste pruunide juuste ja rõõmsa näoga. Kandmas sinist sooja talvejopet, pükse, kollaseid kindaid ja punast mütsi. Armas multifilmistiil.

characters.name: KRISTIINE
characters.description: Väike inimene, umbes 5-aastane tüdruk, pikkade blondide patsikeste ja sõbraliku naeratusega. Kandmas roosat sooja talvejopet, pükse, rohelisi kindaid ja sinist mütsi. Armas multifilmistiil.

locations.name: LUMINE AED
locations.description: A magical winter garden covered in deep, soft white snow. Tall pine trees with snow-covered branches are visible in the background. A small, gently sloping hill is on the left. The sky is bright blue with a few fluffy white clouds. The light is crisp and bright, reflecting off the snow. Cartoon style, cheerful and inviting.

pages.scene: Mart, a small boy with short brown hair, wearing a blue warm winter jacket, pants, yellow gloves, and a red hat, stands next to Kristiine, a small girl with long blonde pigtails, wearing a pink warm winter jacket, pants, green gloves, and a blue hat. They are both standing in a magical winter garden covered in deep, soft white snow. Tall pine trees with snow-covered branches are visible in the background. The sky is bright blue. They are smiling brightly.

Mart and Kristiine are standing in a magical winter garden covered in deep, soft white snow. Tall pine trees with snow-covered branches are visible in the background. The sky is bright blue. Mart points with his yellow-gloved hand at the pristine snow around them, and Kristiine looks on with wide, happy eyes. They both wear their blue and pink winter jackets, pants, hats, and gloves.

Mart and Kristiine, both wearing their blue and pink winter jackets, pants, hats, and gloves, are standing close together in the snowy garden, looking at each other and smiling mischievously. Mart whispers something to Kristiine, who has a thoughtful and excited expression. The deep white snow covers the ground, and snow-covered pine trees are in the background.

Mart and Kristiine are enthusiastically looking at a small, gently sloping hill on the left side of the magical snowy garden. Mart points towards the hill with his yellow-gloved hand, and Kristiine claps her green-gloved hands together in excitement. They are both smiling widely, ready to start their project. They wear their blue and pink winter jackets, pants, hats, and gloves.

Mart and Kristiine are both kneeling in the deep, soft white snow in the garden. Mart is rolling a small snowball with his yellow-gloved hands, pushing it along the snow to make it bigger. Kristiine is doing the same next to him, gently patting and shaping a small snowball with her green-gloved hands. Snow-covered pine trees are in the background. They wear their blue and pink winter jackets, pants, hats, and gloves.

Mart and Kristiine are now pushing much larger snowballs across the snow-covered garden. Mart is pushing a medium-sized snowball, and Kristiine is pushing another medium-sized snowball, both getting noticeably bigger. They are working together, smiling as they make their snowballs larger. Snow-covered pine trees are in the background. They wear their blue and pink winter jackets, pants, hats, and gloves.

Mart and Kristiine are stacking the large snowballs they made. One large snowball is already placed on the snow, forming the base of a wall. Mart is carefully placing another large snowball on top of it, with Kristiine standing next to him, pointing to where the next snowball should go. They are building a part of a snow castle wall. Snow-covered pine trees are in the background. They wear their blue and pink winter jackets, pants, hats, and gloves.

Mart and Kristiine are standing proudly in front of a simple, sturdy snow castle wall they have built. The wall is made of stacked snowballs, forming a protective barrier. They are smiling broadly and looking at their completed creation. The snow-covered garden and pine trees are in the background. They wear their blue and pink winter jackets, pants, hats, and gloves.

Mart and Kristiine are standing inside their newly built snow castle, which has low walls made of stacked snow. They are high-fiving each other with their gloved hands, their faces beaming with joy and satisfaction. The snow-covered garden and pine trees are visible beyond the castle walls. They wear their blue and pink winter jackets, pants, hats, and gloves.

Mart and Kristiine are happily playing inside their snow castle. Mart is peeking over one of the snow walls, laughing, while Kristiine is pretending to guard the castle entrance. They are engaged in imaginative play, surrounded by the snow castle walls. The snow-covered garden and pine trees are in the background under a bright blue sky. They wear their blue and pink winter jackets, pants, hats, and gloves.
